metadata.title: CVE-2021-47212 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net/mlx5: Update error handler for UCTX and UMEMIn the fast unload flow, the device state is set to internal error,which indicates that the driver started the destroy process.In this case, when a destroy command is being executed, it should returnMLX5_CMD_STAT_OK.Fix MLX5_CMD_OP_DESTROY_UCTX and MLX5_CMD_OP_DESTROY_UMEM to return OKinstead of EIO.This fixes a call trace in the umem release process -[ 2633.536695] Call Trace:[ 2633.537518]  ib_uverbs_remove_one+0xc3/0x140 [ib_uverbs][
